EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-22 Customer Invite to 5/23 Webinar - Last Chance.ES-05-22-18 Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register for Tomorrow's Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I wanted to make sure you didn't miss the chance to join us tomorrow at 1 pm EST as we take a closer look Turbonomic's latest features.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>
During this live webinar, our Cloud CTO, Mor Cohen-Tal, and others will explore how Turbonomic’s AI-powered decision engine continuously optimizes RI recommendations in concert with resizing automation – to drive the elasticity AND cost savings you want and expect from the cloud.
I hope you can join us <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>! Regards, Elizabeth
